about.title: About
about.headLine: Take your appointment control
about.text: Our goal is to bring health to your fingertips, in the best possible way and that you always have your health care close by.

cards.title: Services
cards.fistDesc: With Medilab you can request your appointment with your doctor through direct contact.
cards.secondDesc: Have a control of your treatments always at hand.
cards.thirdDesc: At Medilab, you can evaluate our doctors so that our service is always the best for you.

slider.fistDesc: With Medilab you can request your appointment with your doctor through direct contact.

slider.thirdDesc: At Medilab, you can evaluate our doctors so that our service is always the best for you.
